definition[0]: having happened or existed before the event, time, or thing that you are talking about now
example[0]: I’ve met him before on two previous occasions.
example[1]: She has two children from a previous marriage.
example[2]: Do you have any previous experience of this type of work?
example[3]: The lawyer told the judge that Kennedy had no previous convictions.
definition[1]: used when talking about a person, thing, time etc before the one that you are talking about now
example[4]: The car’s previous owner didn’t take very good care of it.
example[6]: The temperature is higher than in previous years.
definition[2]: used when talking about the one that you had just before now, or the one that existed just before now
example[7]: The last apartment we lived in was much smaller than this one.
example[8]: Ben’s last girlfriend was a teacher.
example[9]: Beth broke up with her last boyfriend because he drank too much.
definition[3]: used when talking about people you knew or things you had in the past, or about things that existed in the past and have been replaced by newer things
example[10]: I never liked my old boss.
example[11]: I saw Phil with one of my old girlfriends.
example[12]: The new stadium is much bigger than the old one.
example[13]: He was my old maths teacher.
definition[4]: coming just before the time or thing you have just mentioned, or before the part of a book where you are now
example[14]: There were fewer crimes compared to the preceding year.
example[15]: The author dealt with this subject in the preceding chapters of the book.
example[16]: In the preceding section of the poem, Whitman is talking about how important it is to live in the present.
definition[5]: used to describe someone or something that used to have a particular job or position but does not anymore
example[19]: Kyoto was the former capital of Japan.
definition[6]: someone who used to be someone’s wife, used to be a soldier etc, but is not anymore
example[21]: Lydia is still friends with her ex-husband.
definition[7]: the person or thing that existed before the one you have just mentioned
example[22]: I didn’t enjoy Spielberg’s last film but I thought the one before was all right.
example[23]: Each year, the convention is a little larger than the one before.
